## Facade.persist property

Cache webpack builds to the filesystem.

Signature:

```typescript
persist: persist;
```

## Example 1

```js
app.persist("memory");
```

## Example 2

```js
app.persist("filesystem");
```

## Example 3

```js
app.persist(false);
```
